can you seed pls? Thanks on forehand

For people unable to save : under Vista, make sure that you run the game with Administrator Privileges. You can also try to run run the game in WinXp Compatibility mode. right click Ja2.exe : Properties : Compatibility
Everything is in working order thank you :)
I need help. When I mount it with Daemon Tools and click install. It just crashes. Am I doing something wrong? I have Vista SP1.
Actually nevermind, I figured it out haha. Anyone who is having problems with Vista, make sure you mount the image then open it, right click auto run then click run as admin. Should work.
thank mate)

It's amazing to see so many complaints regarding saves not working, problems installing, blah blah blah... Some of you people are just too frieking stupid.

The game works GREAT, and with the JA2 v1.13 MOD it's absolutely PERFECT.

Honestly, the folks having a hard time figuring out how to get this game to install, or work, should stay away from it, since this is the type of game that requires a little more brain power than your average console based stupidificated-take-you-by-the-hand «modern» game. No kiddies, you'll actually need at least an average I.Q. to play, enjoy and finish this game.
